title: Cannot change autoplay settings
content:
I have two websites listed as exceptions in my autoplay settings that I cannot remove. Please see the attached image to see the addresses.

I cannot remove these websites and I cannot change the settings to block all audio & video.

Anyone have any idea on what might be going wrong and how to fix it?

I am using the current versions of Firefox on my 2008 MacPro, My 2014 MacBook Air and my 6th Gen iPad.

Thanks!
creator: Chazmanium

title: Hi Folks,  "Block pop-up windows" is enabled in Firefox, but I still get popups from www.smh.com.au
content:
Hi Folks,

"Block pop-up windows" is enabled in Firefox, but I still get popups from www.smh.com.au Maybe you have time to investigate - a different type of popup needs blocking.

Sample page https://www.smh.com.au/politics/federal/inflation-tipped-to-fall-while-rent-costs-to-buck-trend-with-15-year-high-20230721-p5dqbj.html

Thanks
creator: bobh8

title: Email forwarding or redirection
content: Is there a way to have email that was sent to one of my email addresses be automatically forwarded to another of my email addresses? Is that something the redirect option could do?
